title: Microsoft Corp. stock outperforms competitors on strong trading day
text:
Shares of Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.17%
       rallied 1.75% to $409.14 Thursday, on what proved to be an all-around positive trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       rising 1.03% to 5,157.36 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       rising 0.34% to 38,791.35. The stock's rise snapped a three-day losing streak. Microsoft Corp. closed $11.68 below its 52-week high ($420.82), which the company achieved on February 9th. The stock demonstrated a mixed performance when compared to some of its competitors Thursday, as Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        -1.06%
       fell 0.07% to $169.00, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +0.21%
       rose 2.02% to $135.24, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.04%
       rose 2.27% to $134.38. Trading volume (18.1 M) remained 4.6 million below its 50-day average volume of 22.7 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use.
